short_description: colkitt is an architects & architectural services company based in york, new york, united states.
long_description: colkitt architecture is a design office and trusted collaborator in creating spaces driven and measured by performance. the business of space—creating habitats for humans to connect with brands—is the primary motivation for their work. beginning his practice in 2006, colkitt's mission has been to finely tune the look, feel, and performance of a brand to reach the highest level. dialogue and sustainability empower this approach. "like a great tailor, an architect's goal is not to make a space fit the brand. great architecture effectively allows the brand to perform optimally, to transform the entity into its highest and best self. for over 20 years, principal nathan lee colkitt has guided the design for global sports brand puma as the company evolves its retail footprint throughout the globe. the studio has expertise in retail and commercial design, architecture, hospitality, real estate development, and adaptive reuse, delivering services throughout the us, canada, and beyond.
business_tags: retail and commercial | real estate and development | planning & designs
